pkgmetadata.longdescription: WSGI Secure Cookie and Session==============================Provides interfaces for secure cookies and sessions in WSGIapplications. Secure cookies are cryptographically signed (but notencrypted) to prevent tampering. Sessions are data associated with agiven user across requests and responses.Install-------Install in a `virtualenv`_ with `pip`_:.. code-block:: text $ pip install secure-cookie.. _virtualenv: https://virtualenv.pypa.io/en/stable/.. _pip: https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/Links------ Documentation: https://secure-cookie.readthedocs.io/- Releases: https://pypi.org/project/secure-cookie/- Code: https://github.com/pallets/secure-cookie- Issue tracker: https://github.com/pallets/secure-cookie/issues- Official chat: https://discord.gg/t6rrQZH
